name: splendid-blog
description: Uses ReactJS and Express for NodeJS to create a dynamic blog website from which April Mathison can express her thoughts and creativity!

scripts.deploy-lambda: claudia create --handler lambda.handler --timeout 20 --deploy-proxy-api --region us-east-2 --no-optional-dependencies --role splendid-blog-lambda --version production --set-env-from-json .env.production.json
scripts.deploy-update: npm run build-client && claudia update --version production --no-optional-dependencies --update-env-from-json .env.production.json
scripts.start-prod: npm run build-client && NODE_ENV=production node server.local.js
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && cd ../

author: Timothy Mathison
